name: Flight (itch)
description:
Take Flight in this avian-based endless runner, where you play as an albatross, avoiding cannon-fire from a psychotic boatman launching all kinds of debris.

Try to obtain the best time and score! Avoid straying off the screen to maintain control and a positive score.

Flight was the result of Ludum Dare 22 (Back in 2011!). It's always been on the back of my mind to port this to Android, and with the help of Cocos2d-x, I have.

More features planned! Stay tuned!

Platforms:
Win32 & Android avaliable!

Also on Google Play!

Credits:
Programmed and produced by Chance Millar (@ValeourM).
Music and sound effects provided by a lovely Lhasa Mencur.
Artwork was produced by hobbyist sprite artist, Andrew Ford.

IMPORTANT:
By purchasing on itch.io, you will have access to all platform-versions of the game, even those not yet released.
If you purchase from another market, such as Google Play, you will not be given the same access, you will only have the Android version
